log.content:
The plain HTML site for your plumbing business has been generated and is saved into the file `index.html`. You can open this file with a web browser to view it. Feel free to customize the content or add more sections as needed to make it even more modern and appealing.

To see the result, you could run:

```bash
open index.html
```

from your terminal if you're on a Mac, or use a similar command for your operating system to open the file in a web browser.
